detail_desc: Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Jumper in a textured-knit cotton blend with long sleeves and close-fitting cuffs.

Set with a skirt with straps in lightweight sweatshirt fabric and a short-sleeved top in cotton jersey. Skirt with an elasticated waist and straps that cross at the back with adjustable fasteners. Top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder.
Straight-cut top in a viscose weave with a V-neck, decorative buttons at the front and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.

Short-sleeved shirt in patterned Tencel™ lyocell with a turn-down collar and French front. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Loose-fitting vest top in airy linen jersey with a V-neck.
Straight-cut jacket in a sturdy, pattern-weave cotton blend with fringed sections. Wide sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a detachable tie belt at the waist and no fasteners. Unlined.

Dress in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pockets, pockets in the side seams, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Fitted polo-neck jumper in fine-knit wool with long sleeves and raw edges at the cuffs and hem.

Slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch flexible denim for maximum mobility. Hard-worn details that are patched on the inside, an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Long-sleeved shirt woven in a cotton blend with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Matching tie/bow tie.
Hair elastic with an imitation leather cuff to add style and character to your ponytail.
5-pocket jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, and wide, flared hems.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Dress in a viscose and linen weave with a collar, button placket, low dropped shoulders and short sleeves. Yoke with a pleat at the back, flap chest pockets and a rounded hem. Unlined.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Cargo shorts in rustly nylon with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Zip fly with a press-stud, mesh-lined side and back pockets, and leg pockets with a concealed zip.
Short dress in an airy weave with an opening at the top and small, pleated stand-up collar with ties at the front. Short, pleated cap sleeves and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist. Lined.
T-shirt in slub cotton jersey with a motif on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.
5-pocket jeans in soft, washed stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, fly with a press-stud and slim legs.

Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and jacquard-patterned details. The tights are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Suede sandals with two straps at the front with a metal buckle and concealed elastication, and an adjustable heel strap with a hook and loop fastening. Moulded suede insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Cotton jersey shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and contrasting colour trims at the hem and sides.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Round-necked T-shirts in soft organic cotton jersey.
Dress in soft cotton jersey with butterfly sleeves, gathers at the top, a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Pull-on trousers in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and a fake welt back pocket. Tapered legs with gathers and a zip at the hems.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft modal and cotton blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top and long raglan sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Wrapover bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with long sleeves and press-studs at the side and crotch.
High-waisted jeans in stretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Shirt in a crisp cotton weave with a collar, wrapover front with ties at the waist, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs.
Sleeveless playsuit in chiffon with an elasticated seam at the waist and an extra, sequined layer at the top with an open back and button at the back of the neck. Jersey lining.
Straight-cut shirt in Tencel™ lyocell denim with a collar, buttons down the front, short dolman sleeves and a rounded hem.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Calf-length shirt in a textured viscose weave with a long, pointed collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with an inset pleat at the back for added width and soft draping. Extra-long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and waist-high slits at the front.
5-pocket shorts in slightly stretchy washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs. Slim fit.

Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck and knot detail at the top. Ties at the back of the neck, and concealed elastication under the bust for extra support. Gathers in the sides for best fit. The swimsuit is made partly from recycled polyamide and polyester.
Joggers in soft, washed cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Knee-length dress in a viscose and cotton weave with a V-neck, elasticated, gathered seam at the waist and short, wide sleeves. Lined.
5-pocket denim jeans with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Scarf in soft, patterned satin. Size 80x80 cm.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Short, double-breasted coat in a soft weave with notch lapels and front pockets. Lined.
Fitted, sleeveless dress in ribbed jersey.

Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, short, unlined sleeves and jetted front pockets. Detachable tie belt at the waist and a single back vent. No fasteners. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket’s lining is recycled.
Sandals with a hook and loop fastening. Imitation suede linings and insoles, and cork and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Lightweight coat in twill made from a viscose blend with lapels and long sleeves with a decorative tab at the cuffs. Pockets in the side seams and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.

Fitted sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric layered over a sports bra with an elastic hem and space for inserts. Double, elastic shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a low-cut back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif, and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Shirt in a checked cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Trenchcoat in a soft weave with a small stand-up collar, lapels at the front and a double-layered yoke. Long, raglan sleeves, welt side pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Longer cardigan in a soft knit with a small appliqué at the top and buttons down the front.

Lightly padded puffer jacket in a quilted weave made from recycled polyester. Detachable hood with concealed press-studs, a zip down the front with a chin guard, and discreet pockets in the side seams. Narrow elastication around the hood and cuffs. Lined.

Base layer set in fast-drying functional fabric with jacquard-patterned sections. Top with long raglan sleeves, contrasting colour seams and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with ribbing at the waist and hems. Seamless.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Long-sleeved tops in cotton jersey with a V-neck and chest pocket.
Fitted T-shirt in soft organic cotton jersey.
Metal hair clips with glittery unicorn appliqués.
Top in soft, printed cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.

Small, crescent-shaped shoulder bag in imitation leather and imitation suede. Flap with a snap lock, a detachable, adjustable metal chain shoulder strap and one inner compartment. Lined. Depth 7 cm. Height 11 cm. Width 18 cm.
Scarf in a patterned cotton weave.
Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a metal buckle on the flap, an inner pocket and a metal chain shoulder strap. Size 4x15x17 cm.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Legs with stripes down the sides and narrow hems.
Short, sleeveless lace dress with a V-neck and adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps. Concealed zip in one side, a seam at the waist with pleats, and a gently flared skirt. Jersey lining.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Baby Exclusive. Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an adjustable, elasticated waist and decorative flatlock seams.
Large, thin metal hoop earrings. Diameter 7.5 cm.

Playsuit in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a deep V-neck, sewn-in wrapover and flounced trim at the front. Long sleeves with elasticated trumpet cuffs, an elasticated seam at the waist with ties at one side, and a flounced trim at the hems.
Blouse in an airy modal weave with a V-neck with decorative gathers, concealed hook-and-eye fastenings at the top and 3/4-length raglan sleeves with smocked cuffs.
Twill cap with an appliqué on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.
Short-sleeved jersey top in a soft modal and cotton blend with a print motif on the front and tie at the hem.
Leggings in imitation leather with an elasticated waist.
Short skirt in a textured weave containing glittery threads with a concealed zip in the side and two flounces to the hem with frayed edges. Lined.
Sleeveless top in ribbed cotton jersey with an embroidered frill trim at the top and over the shoulder straps.
Gently tailored shirt in a stretch cotton blend with a turn-down collar, V-neck, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs.
Block-coloured, rib-knit cotton blend jumper in a relaxed fit with a V-neck, dropped shoulders and wide sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with a hole-patterned front, a ribbed turtle neck and lace trim at the hem. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
